title: Marketplace Roundtable #32: A Sensible Income Strategy For This Market With Arturo Neto
description: In his nearly 20 years of investing, Arturo Neto, CFA of The Income Strategist, has seen pretty much every type of market environment. His approach - which combines bottom up and top down analysis - is all about generating yield and managing risk simultaneously. He walks listeners through his strategy and explains his broader view of the current macro environment in the latest edition of the Marketplace Roundtable Podcast.
itunes:title: A Sensible Income Strategy For This Market With Arturo Neto
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: It's possible to build a true income generating strategy in this low rate environment without taking on too much risk
